entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
